cleaned_text: | | | | | | Buhner Herb Lyme Disease Protocol Chronic Lyme disease is a very difficult condition for patients to live with because some of the negative side effects they experience. Some of the [symptoms of chronic Lyme disease](https://igenex.com/tick-talk/what-are-the-symptoms-of-chronic-lyme-disease/) that a patient may experience include: - chronic inflammation - aches and stiffness - dizziness - tremors - stomach pain - irregular heart beat - anxiety - developing new food allergies - seizures The Buhner herbs Lyme support protocol is designed to help manage symptoms for patients suffering from chronic Lyme disease, Bartonella, Bartonella, Babesia, and related illnesses using herbal supplements recommended by Steven Buhner. Our herbal Lyme disease supplements are designed to help patients alleviate some of the severity of their symptoms.
